description.brief: MobileRobots' Advanced Robot Interface for Applications (ARIA) C++ library

package.description: This package contains MobileRobots' ARIA C++ library (software development toolkit or SDK) for all MobileRobots' ActivMedia platforms. ARIA can dynamically control your robot's velocity, heading, relative heading and other motion parameters either through simple low-level commands or through its high-level Actions infrastructure. ARIA also receives odometric position estimates, sonar readings and all other current operating data sent by the robot platform.
